formElement.label: Server configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Supply the configuration name of the JBoss server. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Supply the configuration name of the JBoss server.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Physical location of the jboss client script:
formElement.documentation: Provide the physical location of the jboss Command Line Interface script, i.e: 'jboss-cli.bat', '/path/to/jboss-cli.sh'.

formElement.label: Wait time:
formElement.documentation: Wait time for terminal status in seconds. If not provided, only one check will be performed. If 0, it will wait until criteria is met. Default 300.

formElement.label: Criteria:
formElement.documentation: A desired status of host controller. The procedure will fail if the criteria is not met.
